mapper.select: select p.ppr_id, p.ppr_quz_id, p.ppr_usr_id, p.ppr_content, p.ppr_standard, p.ppr_answer, p.ppr_update_time, p.ppr_score, p.ppr_total, p.ppr_index, p.ppr_session, p.ppr_active from la_paper p inner join (select ppr_usr_id, max(ppr_session) as ppr_session, min(ppr_id) as ppr_id from la_paper where ppr_active=true and ppr_session < now() - interval '5 minute' group by ppr_usr_id) a on p.ppr_usr_id = a.ppr_usr_id and p.ppr_session = a.ppr_session and p.ppr_id = a.ppr_id
mapper.update: UPDATE public.la_paper SET ppr_active=false WHERE ppr_quz_id = #{quizID}
mapper.select: select p.ppr_id, p.ppr_quz_id, p.ppr_usr_id, p.ppr_content, p.ppr_standard, p.ppr_answer, p.ppr_update_time, p.ppr_score, p.ppr_total, p.ppr_index, p.ppr_session, p.ppr_active from la_paper p where p.ppr_usr_id = #{userID} and ppr_score is null order by p.ppr_session desc limit 1
